dt-api.name: stateRestore.activeStates()
dt-api.summary: Get the details of all of the currently active states

type.description: Retrieves a stored state from the StateRestore extension.
type.returns: Returns a DataTables API containing an array of details about the states that are currently active.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to retrieve details about all of the currently active states that are managed by the `-init stateRestore` extension.
The method is plural as it is possible to have multiple states that are active at the same time.
A Datatables API is returned containing all of the active states as objects. Each object contains the following properties.
* `name` - The name of the state. * `data` - The data that is used to implement the state.
